Key Features

  • ðŸªœ

    Climb the SERPs faster

    Find low-competition keywords and topics compatible with your site. Take advantage of low-quality SERP results to rank faster and drive relevant traffic.
  • ðŸ”Ž

    Detect relevant clusters

    Discover seed topics handpicked for your site. Dive into individual keyword recommendations for each and learn how to outrank the incumbents.
  • ðŸ¦¾

Get Actionable Insights with an SEO Gap Analysis

Have you ever played whack-a-mole with your keyword research?

You may have a massive CSV full of possible keywords to target, but youâ€™re unsure which ones will move the needle faster.

Donâ€™t break a sweat: SERP Gap Analyzer gives you an actionable list of keyword recommendations, designed to help you hit the ground running and provide an immediate boost of traffic.

Discover low-competition keywords tailormade for your site

SERP Gap Analyzer finds keywords you should target based on actual weaknesses and problems in the top ten results, such as:

  • Low authority sites
  • Title tag mismatch with search intent
  • Poor readability score
  • Outdated content
  • Slow load time
  • Forum/social media results

Update existing content to rank higher

Get unstuck in the SERPs and move up the results page faster by addressing specific flaws and issues with your content.

Examine specific recommendations such as:

  • Fixing search intent mismatch
  • Thin content warnings
  • Headline rewrites for better clickthrough rates
  • Technical fixes, such as page load speeds
  • Adding specific subtopics and semantically related keywords to your content

Supercharge your writers with built-in AI tools

Use SERP Gap Analyzerâ€™s GPT-4 powered AI content writing tools to generate content briefs complete content outlines, SEO optimized meta titles, meta descriptions, and entire blog posts from a single keyword. Save hours of manual research and accelerate your content velocity with TopicRankerâ€™s AI copilot.

Leverage topical depth analysis for highly specific cluster mapping

Understand your websiteâ€™s specific area of expertise and use that to spread your wings into related topics and queries.

Our SERP gap engine finds underserved seed topics and breaks them down into keyword recommendations, highlighting specific issues and gaps that you can use to outrank the competition.

Show more
